tables.table_schema: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS TradeOrders;CREATE TABLE TradeOrders.TradeOrdersDetails (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, order_type VARCHAR(255), symbol VARCHAR(255), quantity INT, price DECIMAL(10,2), execution_time TIMESTAMP, executed_by VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE TradeOrders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  order_type VARCHAR(255),
  order_size INT,
  symbol VARCHAR(10),
  order_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ExecutionDetails (
  execution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  order_id INT,
  executed_price FLOAT,
  executed_quantity INT,
  execution_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE trade_orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  symbol VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  order_type VARCHAR(20),
  order_time TIMESTAMP,
  execution_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE execution_details (
  execution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  order_id INT,
  execution_time TIMESTAMP,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  executed_quantity INT,
  execution_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE trade_history (
  trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  order_id INT,
  trade_time TIMESTAMP,
  client_id INT,
  symbol VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  trade_type VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE TradeOrder (
  order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  order_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ExecutionDetail (
  execution_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  order_id INTEGER REFERENCES TradeOrder(order_id),
  executed_quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
  execution_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  execution_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE TradeHistory (
  trade_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  order_id INTEGER REFERENCES TradeOrder(order_id),
  execution_id INTEGER REFERENCES ExecutionDetail(execution_id),
  trader_id INTEGER REFERENCES Trader(trader_id),
  trade_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE trade_executions (
    execution_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id UUID NOT NULL,
    execution_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    execution_quantity INT NOT NULL,
    execution_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
